choices: She stops there and let’s you go.
11.content: You end up running into the Nurse who has been walking for hours and has very sweaty and stinky feet. She knows that the only way that her feet are going to get cleaned is if someone does it for her. She throws you to the ground and demands that you get to work in licking her feet clean. Her feet are very big, probably around size 12 and she had been wearing no shoes the whole day. She tells you to start at the heel and work your way up to the toes, licking up all the sweat and dirt as you go! You comply in fear of your life and clean the whole sole of her foot lick after lick. The sole itself takes at least 20 minutes to clean and you’re already on a full stomach because of all the sweat you have digested.
11.title: Feet

112.content: The nurse isn’t fully satisfied with just the sole being clean, she wants the toes done too! But first you must place your nose beneath the toes and savour the smell before getting to work in cleaning them! The smell is very overpowering and almost knocks you out. After about 30 minutes of smelling her dirty stinky toes it’s time for you to get to work in cleaning! She tells you to start by licking in between each toe and collecting every bit of toe jam, before swallowing it like a good boy! When she spreads her toes for you you can see huge lumps of toe jam lodged in between them and it’s your job to eat it! You get to work and start eating the toe jam one by one, but there is so much toe jam there that you don’t know if you can eat it all at once. Maybe you’re gonna be here a while feasting on this toejam...
112.title: You haven’t finished yet...

1121.content: Your stomach is so full, yet her feet are still dirty. She is not happy that you stopped. As you tried to protest, shoved her foot down your throat. You can taste a lot of toe jam. You struggle, but to no avail does her foot budge from your throat. She tries to shove it deeper, but your jaw won't allow it. As you thrash, and try to escape, the reality of running out of air gets to you. Then you start panicking...
1121.title: Feasting on this toejam...

11211.content: The nurse stares down at you as you struggle at her feet. You start to fear her as you use all your might. You are now getting light-headed. 3...2...out like a light. She raises her saliva-drenched sole out of your lifeless mouth. Her foot is still of your face ready to collect your soul. Your soul is absorbed into her foot you are hers forever.
11211.title: You're Going to Die

13.content:
You were walking through the woods on your way home after you and your friends had been camping. The whole way back you were very nervous as you had heard stories about crazy people who lived in the woods.

The story you were most afraid of was
13.title: Dominating

131.content:
They say that she is the ultimate predator, and that she never misses her mark. Rumors say she lives in these very woods awaiting her next victim. Just thinking about her tale sends a slight shiver down your spine.

However, lost in thought you realize that you have trailed of the path and are lost.

"Damnit" you whisper to yourself.

Just then...
131.title: The Huntress

choices: A hatchet lands next to you as a shadow looms.
You manage to get into the house.
1312.content:
"Huh?" you say as you look back.

Nothing is there, as quickly as you looked it was gone. Whatever it was, you knew you had to get out of these woods. Quickly.

You began a light jog forward hoping to come to a path or a sign, something to tell you where you are.

*snap* *crunch*

Behind you...

Something, no someONE was following you.

You sprinted as fast as you could hoping to outrun whatever was behind you. You make out something in the distance. It appears to be a lodge of some sort. Quickly you head to the front door and grab the handle.
1312.title: *snap*

choices: She reached for the door handle and took you into the home
13121.content:
No matter how hard you jiggled the handle it was no use, it was locked. As a last ditch effort you banged and shouted for help. A shadow loomed over you, and as you turned around to face it...

It was HER.

Standing 6'9" she towered over you almost growling like a savage animal. She wore a blood stained rabbit mask as well as old Russian attire.

You were speechless, shaking in your shoes unable to move as she bent down. She came nearly eye level with you before she...
13121.title: A hatchet lands next to you as a shadow looms.

151.content:
The Entity grew restless within it's own realm wanting to feast on the misery of the survivors some more. However, the usual hook sacrifices were not enough to suffice it. It's as if they had gotten used to getting strung up on a meat hook and impaled by a giant spider-like appendage. It also seems all the other nasty executions The Entity's minions are not able to suffice. It has just the solution, The Entity referred to it as the Voracious Memento Mori. It was something akin to a Ebony Memento Mori but with a twist, the killer would instead consume the survivor alive instead of outright killing them. What could be more miserable then getting slowly digested alive within a killers stomach. It was simply genius.

Now onto the hard part, there was only one for now and there are so many candidates to choose from among the roster. So, the big question here is who's Bloodweb should it put the new Mori in first. If it wanted to narrow down it's choices it should start with one simple qeustion. Should it give it to either a male killer or a female one?
151.title: A Hunger for Flesh

1512.content:
The Entity decided to cut it's options down for who would receive the Voracious Memento Mori significantly by choosing a female killer. Now, all that was left was to whittle down it's remaining few until a single killer remained.

First up was it's first female killer Sally Smithson, also known as The Nurse by the survivors.
1512.title: Female

15122.content: The Entity realized it's mistake before it could make it. How could The Nurse eat anyone with that bag over her head? It was simple ridiculous. However, Lisa Sherwood or The Hag as she was known by the survivors already was known to eat people, or at least tear out there liver and take a few bites. Surely she would be a great fit for the new Mori.
15122.title: The Hag

151222.content: The Hag wasn't a good an option as The Entity thought. Sure she took a few bites out of people but It doubted she could handle a whole person inside of her. Now the Huntress, or Anna, she was built to be a predator. She could almost eat some without the Voracious Memento Mori. However, It must think carefully before proceeding.
151222.title: The Huntress

1512222.content: As great a candidate The Huntress was, The Entity had to consider all it's options before bestowing the Voracious Memento Mori upon the lucky killer of it's choice. Next up was Amanda Young, or The Pig to the survivors and Jigsaw to Detective Tapp. She isn't exactly the predatory type but looks can be deceiving.
1512222.title: The Pig

15122222.content: The pig wasn't really that good a match for the Voracious Memento Mori anyways. Next up was Rin Yamaoka or The Spirit to the survivors. She also did't feel like a good match, but that's mostly do to the slash mark in her abdomen. However, The Entity was't going to hold that against her.
15122222.title: The Spirit

151222222.content: On second thought maybe The Entity should go with someone with an intact stomach. However, now had a bit a two part problem. With The Spirit turned down it set it sights on the female half of The Legion. The first problem being that there were two of them. So now it had to pick between either Julie or Susie as well as it's final option. The other problem being they definitely were not predator at all. Let's face it, if it were't for their association with Frank, The Entity's intended killer, all of the rest of The Legion would be survivors. Now it had to pick which of these two "killers" gets the Voracious Memento Mori.
151222222.title: The Legion

choices: Leaving this one open in case DBD adds another female killer.
1512222223.content:
Oh right there was one final female killer, unless it brings in somebody new. There was The Plague whose power may not exactly agree with eating people but lets not rule her out just yet.

Though to be honest The Entity had combed through all the female killers Bloodwebs looking for the one to bestow the Voracious Memento Mori. However, at this point it realized it wasted so much time it was able to make enough for all of them.
1512222223.title: The Plague

153.content:
The Entity felt a sense of unrest within it's realm. Many of it's inhabitants, both survivor and killer alike were feeling a deep hunger. Normally it would simply make it so that they did not need to eat, but the hunger was there nonetheless. So, in order to appease it's Killer minions it created the Voracious Memento Mori so that they might feed. It worked similarly to an Ebony Memento Mori, but instead of executing a survivor they would swallow them whole. This would keep all of The Entity's minions well fed and work as a nice new form of sacrificing survivors.

Speaking of which, it would be unfair to let it' prey starve as well. So it might as well toss a few of the new Mori's in their Bloodwebs as well. They wouldn't be able to actually use them during matches against killers. But it would still let them eat others while back at The Campfire at least. That way they would also be well fed.

It had occurred to The Entity that a diet of full grown humans might cause some weight gain within the human body. But it could do something about that, right? The only thing that matters now is who is first to try out the new Mori.
153.title: A Hunger for More

info.brief_description: Any fetish at all with dead by daylight characters
info.description:
-Feel Free to add literally whatever you want nothing is off limits

-no length limits

-Have fun with it
